body:
@hallas My app is simple web server that gets tasks and process them in external goroutine, i developed it on 1.4 and i did not get so big pauses, but when i just rebuild it with 1.5 i get 10,20-50 sec pauses.
Also at the screenshots application is in "sleep" mode - not process any tasks, and as you can see at moment when GC caused spike application do not allocate new memory, that is why i think may be new GC algoritm has some new rules that i should follow.
Most part data in my app is stored in [][10]int64, most big slice has 120 000 elements.

(and sorry for my English)
